description: Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/CFTA/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK. Tendering Procedures: Suppliers on permanent list or able to meet qualification requirements.
full_summary:
# Contract Title and Identification
**Project Title:** Indian River Fishway Replacement
**Identification Number:** EA011-230625/A

**Request for Proposal Announcement:**
Contract Title:  
The Government of Canada (GC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) to procure Heavy Civil – Marine Engineering consulting services for the Indian River Fishway Replacement project.

**Project Background:**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) intends to solicit proposals from eligible candidates to provide Heavy Civil – Marine Engineering consulting services for the investigation of options and detailed design of a new vertical slot fishway to replace the existing pool and weir fishway at Indian River, Springdale, Newfoundland and Labrador.

# Tender Requirements
The list of pre-qualified firms invited to submit a proposal is as follows:

* AFN Engineering Inc.
* CIMA+
* Pinto Engineering Ltd.
* CBCL Ltd.
* Eastpoint Engineering Ltd.
* Harbourside Engineering Consultants
* Dillon Consulting
* WSP Canada Inc.
* Wood Canada Ltd.
* Stantec Consulting
* Meridian Engineering Inc.
* Eastern Designers 
* EXP Services Inc
* Hatch Ltd
* Jewer Bailey Consultants Ltd.
* SNC-Lavalin Inc.
* GEMTEC

# Proposal Submission Instructions
Proposals must be submitted using the epost Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. The Government encourages proponents to use this electronic solution to transmit their proposals. Facsimile transmission is not recommended due to administrative reasons, but is offered as an alternative option in case of incompatibility or inability to use epost Connect.

# Proposal Evaluation Criteria
The proposal evaluation will be based on the Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

# Contracting Authority
Stewart Grant, telephone (782) 640-2592, fax (902) 496-5016, email [stewart.grant@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stewart.grant@pwgsc.gc.ca) is the Contracting Authority for this project.

**Bid Receiving and Contracting Entity Information**

* Bid Receiving: Public Works and Government Services Canada, 1713 Bedford Row, Halifax, NS B3J 1T3
* epost Connect: TPSGC.RAReceptionSoumissionsNE-ARBidReceivingNS.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
